clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Sulfathiazole is effective against a wide range of gram positive and gram negative pathogenic microorganisms Although no longer used in humans it is used in cattle

contraindications.disease: Acute oral toxicity LD50 4500 mg kg Mouse

incompatibilities.description: The serum concentration of Magnesium can be decreased when it is combined with Sulfathiazole
Sulfathiazole may decrease the excretion rate of Benzylpenicillin which could result in a higher serum level
